评论概述: Cool ear climbers for a great price
评论详情: I wanted to try ear climber earrings after seeing my friend’s pair. I didn’t want to pay a lot for an experimental pair of earrings when I wasn’t sure I’d like the feel of what essentially is a paper clip along the ear.  Takes a minute to get used to how to put these on and they tend to slip/ rotate at times, but that is the flaw with ear climber earrings-not just this pair. Quite pleased. I may gift these to a friend!

This is my second set only bc I lost the first. I love them. I wear them in my third hole and have no issue with them falling down. They have a good sparkle but are simple. I love them and have lots of compliments on them. No issue sleeping but my hair does sometimes get caught in them overnight.

评论概述: Good size, minimalist yet nice, don't stay up
评论详情: I read that others didn't stay up, but gave them a go anyway. They fall down often as they have no actual back to secure them. All that said, they do slip and I have to put them back in place a couple times a day.

These earrings are very cute and light weight.  They do look a tad bit cheap, but still cute.  I took them out of the packaging carefully and started to thread one earring into my ear.  As I attempted to adjust (climb) the earring up on my ear, it broke in half.  So, I only got to wear the earring for about 5-10 seconds.  I was disappointed, but not too upset since they were only $12.  But I would think $12 earrings should last me for at least a couple months, no?

I was suspicious ordering these off Amazon, thinking the quality wouldn’t be as advertised but good enough for a night out. These are absolutely as described and gold filled. I have sensitivity to metals, particularly earring posts, and have had these in my ears straight for about 3 weeks with absolutely no rash, reactions, itching or turning green! I get plenty compliments how cute and trendy they are, and because I know the quality is good, have gifted them to three more people!  To avoid slipping I simple “pinched” the base ever so slightly and have had no problem.  LOVE THESE!
